articles.author: Suleiman Al-Khalidi
articles.description: Insurgents swept into Aleppo, east of Idlib province, on Friday night, forcing the army to redeploy in the biggest challenge to President Bashar al-Assad in years.
articles.title: Russian, Syrian jets intensify bombing of Syria's rebel-held northwest

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces kept up bombardments across the enclave and blew up houses on its northern edge.
articles.title: Israeli strikes kill 15 in Gaza, Cairo holds fresh talks with Hamas

articles.author: Felix Light
articles.description: Irakli Kobakhidze praised police for cracking down on protesters.
articles.title: Georgian PM dismisses US condemnation of violence against protesters

articles.author: Luiza Ilie
articles.description: Romania's ruling leftist Social Democrats (PSD) looked set to win the most votes in a parliamentary election on Sunday, defeating a resurgent far-right movement challenging the country's pro-Western orientation, an exit poll showed.
articles.title: Romanian leftists ahead of resurgent far-right in election: exit poll

articles.author: David Ljunggren
articles.description: Trump has promised to slap tariffs on Canadian imports unless Ottawa prevents migrants and drugs from crossing the frontier. Canada sends 75% of all goods and services exports to the United States.
articles.title: Trudeau promised Trump tougher border controls, says top Canada official

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: To survive the vote in the fractured lower house, Barnier needs Marine Le Pen's party to abstain, otherwise his government and the budget bill could fall, plunging France into a political crisis.
articles.title: Le Pen tells France's Barnier to negotiate or be felled

articles.author: Crispian Balmer
articles.description: A former Israeli defense minister has accused Israel of committing war crimes and ethnic cleansing in the Gaza Strip, drawing a sharp rebuke from government ranks.
articles.title: Former Israeli defense minister Yaalon warns of ethnic cleansing in Gaza

articles.author: Joyce Lee, Valerie Volcovici
articles.description: The hoped-for treaty to come out of these talks could be the most significant deal relating to environmental protection as well as climate-warming emissions since the 2015 Paris Agreement.
articles.title: Battle over curbing plastic output jeopardises UN treaty hopes

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Meta in October said it took down 8,000 so-called celeb bait ads.
articles.title: Meta tightens ad rules to curb financial scams aimed at Australians

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ecuadorean police reported on Sunday that officers found 10 dead bodies at a property in Guabo, a community in El Oro province in the Andean country's south.
articles.title: Ecuador police report 10 killed in El Oro province
